text:
Here Comes the Bride! See Jessica Chastain’s Wedding Gown

It was a dress fit for a bride! Just days after the Oscar nominee tied the knot with longtime boyfriend, fashion executive Gian Luca Passi de Preposulo in Italy, the first photos of her…
